name: Ice Age: Mammoth Mayhem
description: The latest adventures of heroes of "Ice Age" cartoon are at your mobile phones. Meet your old friends! Hairy mammoth Manny, Sid the sloth, saber-toothed tiger Diego and prehistoric squirrel Scrat came back to us. In the new game Mammoth Mayhem an inseparable trio is together and enjoining the benefits of the melting world as before.
